ALBUM_CONFIG_DESCRIPTION:
Customize the style of your album in varying ways, such as:
- Cover Image
- Pages
- Name
- Color
CORRECT_USAGE:
{{author}} | You have used the command incorrectly 
Proper usage : `{{prefix}}albumconfig <albumName>`
NO_ALBUMS: {{author}} | You have made no albums yet
ALBUM_NOT_FOUND: {{author}} | You dont have any album with the name `{{albumName}}`
NO_PAGES: That album has no pages! Use the command `sacf <albumName>` to add pages to the album
ADD_CARDS: Cards: Add cards to your page
MINIMUM_CARDS_NEEDED: An album must contain a minimum of two cards
MENU_CARDS_DESC: Set the cards to be displayed on a page
MENU_LAYOUT_DESC: Arrange your cards in different styles
MENU_CANCEL_DESC: Stop the interaction and go back
ALLOWED_PATTERNS_COLORS:
You are allowed to use geometric patterns and colors. Any image depicting one or more characters has to stem from an official source. It is **YOUR RESPONSIBILITY** to inspect the source and confirm its legitimacy. Using fanart on a background is prohibited and any background failing to abide this rule will be deleted. Take advise from players in the [Support Server](https://discord.gg/SYt2d2mhuF) before submitting.

*The deducted amount of a submission will be refunded, should the submission be rejected.
EMBED_FOOTER: Paste the links below within 2 mins
ENTER_CODES: Enter card codes separated by spaces: `code1 code2 code3`
NO_CARDS_FOUND: No cards found in page. Set cards from the select menu.
EMBED_LAYOUT_CUSTOMIZE_FOOTER: Customize: x - width y - height a - angle z - zoom
NO_GEMS: You do not have enough gems
NO_WISTS: You do not have enough wists
SUBMISSION_ERROR: Cannot submit because you are missing {{ammount}} {{currency}}
LAYOUT_CUSTOMIZE_CONFIRMATION:
Are you sure you want to set:

{{cardArray}}

Total number of cards in this page will be `{{totalNumber}}`
You can customize your layout from the select menu
WRONG_URL: The url must be a discord image url | Example https://cdn.discord... or https://media.discord..
INVALID_PAYMENT_METHOD: The payment method must be `wist` or `gems`
SUBMISSION_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to submit?
TOTAL_ALBUM_PAGES: No. of pages in this album: `{{totalPages}}`
EDIT_ALBUM_NAME: Name: Edit name of the album
ADD_ALBUM_PAGES: Add Pages: Attach pages to the album
EDIT_ALBUM_DESC: Description: Set description for the album
BUY_PAGE: You need to buy page before adding cards
MAXIMUM_PAGES: You can have maximum of 10 pages per album
MENU_ALBUM_CANCEL_DESC: Stop the interaction and go back
NEW_ALBUM_DESCRIPTION: Enter a description with less than 140 characters for the album
NEW_ALBUM_COLOR: Provide the glow code for the text
NEW_ALBUM_COVER: Provide cover image url to submit
NEW_ALBUM_NOTE: Make sure the image used in the album cover is official. No refunds if you use unofficial images. Take help from users or reverse search to find or hire an album maker. Use the default album cover image to edit it. Only covers in the same shape will be accepted. The resolution for the album cover is `908x658`
ATTACH_ALBUM_PAGES: Type the number of album pages you want to attach to this album
DELETE_ALBUM: Are you sure you want to delete this album permanently?
COST_MISSING: Cannot add pages because you are missing {{cost}} <:silvercoin:915619222229512213>
ALBUM_NAME_ERROR: The album name must be alphanumeric, must not contain special characters, space, or caps
ALBUM_NAME_SUCCESS: The new album name will be {{name}}
ALBUM_DESC_SUCCESS:
The new album description will be
{{description}}
MAX_ALBUM_PAGE: You can only have 10 pages per album | Current page count: `{{currentPages}}` | Purchasable: `{{purchasablePages}}`
ADD_PAGES_CONFIRMATION:
You have `{{pages}}` pages in the album
Are you sure you want to add {{amount}} pages to the album.
The total cost will be {{price}} <:silvercoin:915619222229512213>
